coreAtributes.authorTag: A small tag sewn into the side seam reads "MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: trenchcoat
coreAtributes.description: A knee-length coat secured around the waist and wrists. Designed to keep wind and rain off of the wearer, it is generously sized to fit practically any body type, making it useful in hiding the wearer's identity especially when combined with headwear.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(put)] [npc.her] arms through the trenchcoat's sleeves and [npc.verb(button)] up the front before cinching up the belt.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(put)] [npc2.her] arms through the trenchcoat's sleeves and [npc.verb(button)] up the front before cinching up the belt.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.namePos] arms through the trenchcoat's sleeves and hastily [npc.verb(button)] up the front before hastily tightening up the belt.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(uncinch)] the belt and [npc.verb(unbutton)] the front of [npc.her] trenchcoat and [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] arms out of the sleeves.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(uncinch)] the belt and [npc.verb(unbutton)] the front of [npc2.namePos] trenchcoat and [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.her] [npc2.verb(pull)] [npc2.her] arms out of the sleeves.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] at the belt before popping open the buttons on the front of [npc2.namePos] trenchcoat and roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.her] arms out of the sleeves.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] hastily [npc.verb(button)] up the front of [npc2.namePos] trenchcoat.
